caption.title: Phylogenetic relationship of the RNA-2 segment of Tomato chlorosis virus from South Africa (ToCR2-186) and all other fully sequenced ToCV isolates to date.
caption.p: The phylogram was constructed using the Maximum likelihood method based on the Hasegawa-Kishino model and a bootstrap value of 1000 replicates in MEGA 6. The accession number for each isolate is displayed in parenthesis.
